General.Name: Moulinvest
General.Description: Moulinvest S.A. produces and sells wood products in France. It manufactures nailed wood panels, wood pellets, and lumbers; and generates electricity using cogeneration from biomass. The company also offers construction lumber and prefabricated solid wood walls, structural and roofing wood products, profiles for timber frame houses, electricity and telecommunication poles, and sawing products. In addition, it provides carpentry cutting, framing, glued laminated timber, counter glued timber, and CLT under the MASSIFBOIS brand; and outdoor landscaping and equestrian products, as well as poles for arboriculture and viticulture, and equestrian equipment under the DECOVERT brand name. Moulinvest S.A. was founded in 1916 and is based in Dunières, France.
